header.title: STDLIB

description.p: The STDLIB application is mandatory in the sense that the minimal system based on Erlang/OTP consists of Kernel and STDLIB. The STDLIB application contains no services.

item.p: Can be used to run the Erlang shell in restricted mode.
Can be used to set the exception handling of the evaluator process of Erlang shell.
Can be used to determine how many commands are saved by the Erlang shell.

p: Can be used to set a customized Erlang shell prompt function.

item.p: Can be used to determine how many results are saved by the Erlang shell.
Can be used to determine how the Erlang shell outputs lists of integers.
